mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Callie and Hettie Wade
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Callie and Hettie Wade S.R. Reed, Guardian Recorded in Ledger Book 5, Folio 50, in the Floyd County Courthouse. Date recorded as April, 1899 term
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
